ya10.1.2:12.1: avaseso kāyo → avaseso kāyo kāyo (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1); avasesā kāyo (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ya10.1.2:61.1: avaseso → avaseso kāyo (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1); avasesā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ya10.1.2:104.1: Avasesā indriyā → indriyā indriyā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.1.2:2.1: cakkhundriyañca → aññātāvindriyañca (bj) | na cakkhundriyaṃ → na aññātāvindriyaṃ (bj)
ya10.1.2:394.1: Yaṃ sotaṃ indriyaṃ taṃ sotañceva indriyañca. Avasesaṃ sotaṃ na indriyaṃ → āmantā (si, cck, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ya10.1.2:404.1: Yo kāyo indriyaṃ so kāyo ceva indriyañca. Avaseso kāyo na indriyā → āmantā (si, cck, pts-vp-pli1ed)
